resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108541</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108541</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085937</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Preparing English language learners for reading comprehension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorbereiten der englische Sprachenanfänger für 
Leseerfassen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Préparer des étudiants d'anglais pour la 
compréhension de lecture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Preparando learners de língua inglesa para a 
compreensão da leitura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Preparando gli studenti di lingue inglesi per la 
comprensione della lettura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προετοιμασία των αρχαρίων αγγλικής γλώσσας για την 
κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Preparación de los principiantes de lenguaje 
inglés para la comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Use Know, Want to know, Learned (KWL) charts, circle maps and brainstorming webs, and concept maps to prepare English language learners, content-area learners, and all students for reading comprehension.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebrauch weiß, möchte wissen, gelehrte Diagramme
(KWL), Kreiskarten und Geistesstörungweb, und Konzept bildet ab, um 
englische Sprachenanfänger, Inhalt-Bereich Anfänger und alle 
Kursteilnehmer für Leseerfassen vorzubereiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'utilisation savent, veulent savoir, les 
diagrammes (KWL), les cartes de cercle et les Web instruits de séance
de réflexion, et le concept trace pour préparer des étudiants 
d'anglais, des étudiants de contenu-zone, et tous les étudiants pour
la compréhension de lecture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O uso sabe, quer saber, as cartas (KWL), mapas do 
círculo e Web instruídos do brainstorming, e o conceito traça para 
preparar learners de língua inglesa, learners da índice-área, e 
todos os estudantes para a compreensão da leitura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'uso sa, desidera sapere, tabelle (KWL), 
programmi del cerchio e Web istruiti di "brainstorming" ed il concetto
traccia per preparare gli studenti di lingue inglesi, i principianti 
di soddisfare-zona e tutti gli allievi per la comprensione della 
lettura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η χρήση ξέρει, θέλει να ξέρει, μαθημένα διαγράμματα 
(KWL), χάρτες κύκλων και Ιστοί "brainstorming", και χάρτες 
έννοιας για να προετοιμάζονται οι αρχάριοι αγγλικής γλώσσας, οι 
αρχάριοι ικανοποιημένος-περιοχής, και όλοι οι σπουδαστές για την 
κατανόηση ανάγνωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El uso sabe, desea saber, las cartas (KWL), las 
correspondencias del círculo y los Web doctos de la reunión de 
reflexión, y el concepto asocia para preparar a principiantes de 
lenguaje inglés, a principiantes del contenido-a'rea, y a todos los 
estudiantes para la comprensión de la lectura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:ELLEN DOUGLAS

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          <language>en</language>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0

FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108541</entry>
